main event: A resident of Ardmore, Oklahoma reported observing an unidentified flying object in the sky over the city on April 8, 1964.
interesting points: The object appeared to be hovering or moving slowly in an easterly direction.
The object was elliptical in shape and emitted a bright, pulsating light.
The object suddenly accelerated and disappeared from view within a matter of seconds.
The witness's description of the object was consistent with the initial report, but no other witnesses were located in the immediate area.
The object could not be associated with any known type of weather phenomena or aircraft.
sighted object: an elliptical-shaped object with a bright, pulsating light
